title: Family Crest/Quick guide

properties.name: description
properties.value: It is recommended to bring all the required quest items with you from the start of the quest along with some food and the following teleports if possible: Varrock, Camelot, Ardougne, Falador, Edgeville (Amulet of glory), Al Kharid (Ring of dueling).

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Family Crest/Quick guide
 This quick guide has an in-depth guide here.
It contains a more detailed description of dialogue, cutscenes, and storyline.

Details[edit | edit source]

Start point Talk to Dimintheis in south-east Varrock.
Official difficultyExperienced
DescriptionThere is a man in Varrock who needs a bit of help. He is of noble heritage, but without his family's crest, he can't prove it. Unfortunately, his three sons took the crest with them when they left, scattering all across RuneScape.
Official lengthMedium
Requirements
  • 40 Mining (boostable)
  • 40 Smithing (boostable)
  • 59 Magic (boostable)
  • 40 Crafting (boostable)
  • The ability to defeat a level 170 demon (can be safespotted)
Items required
  • Shrimps
  • Salmon
  • Tuna
  • Bass
  • Swordfish
  • Pickaxe - rune highly recommended
  • 2 cut rubies
  • Ring Mould
  • Necklace Mould
  • Any poison cure like Antipoison (you will lose this item)
  • Means to cast all 4 Blast spells
Recommended
  • 55 Combat level
  • An extra antipoison potion for yourself (for the poison spiders in Edgeville Dungeon)
  • Varrock, Camelot, Falador, and Ardougne Teleports (teleporting to Ardougne requires completion of Plague City)
  • Amulet of Glory to fast travel to Edgeville and Al-Kharid (Ring of Dueling can also be used for Al-Kharid, and Soul Wars minigame teleport for Edgeville)
Enemies to defeat
  • Chronozon (level 170) (can be safespotted)
Ironman concerns

Warning: The player visits the Wilderness section of Edgeville Dungeon

  • For a swordfish purchasable from The Shrimp and Parrot:
    • 50 Fishing (boostable)
    • 45 Cooking (boostable)
  • For a bass (a raw bass can be obtained from a Reward pool) :
    • 46 Fishing (boostable)
    • 43 Cooking (boostable)

Unfortunately, his three sons took the crest with them when they left, scattering all across ''RuneScape''.","difficulty":"Experienced","kills":"* [[Chronozon]] ''(level 170)'' (can be safespotted)","name":"Family Crest/Quick guide","start":"Talk to [[Dimintheis]] in south-east [[Varrock]].","length":"Medium","ironman":"'''<span style=\" color:red;\">Warning:</span>''' [[File:Hardcore ironman chat badge.png]] The player visits the [[Wilderness]] section of [[Edgeville Dungeon]] \n*For a [[swordfish]] purchasable from [[The Shrimp and Parrot]]:\n** <span class=\"scp\" data-skill=\"Fishing\" data-level=\"50\">[[File:Fishing icon.png|21x21px|link=Fishing|alt=Fishing]] 50 [[Fishing]]</span> <sup>(<span title=\"This requirement is boostable\" style=\"cursor:help; text-decoration: underline dotted;\">boostable</span>)</sup>\n** <span class=\"scp\" data-skill=\"Cooking\" data-level=\"45\">[[File:Cooking icon.png|21x21px|link=Cooking|alt=Cooking]] 45 [[Cooking]]</span> <sup>(<span title=\"This requirement is boostable\" style=\"cursor:help; text-decoration: underline dotted;\">boostable</span>)</sup>\n*For a [[bass]] (a [[raw bass]] can be obtained from a [[Reward pool]]) :\n** <span class=\"scp\" data-skill=\"Fishing\" data-level=\"46\">[[File:Fishing icon.png|21x21px|link=Fishing|alt=Fishing]] 46 [[Fishing]]</span> <sup>(<span title=\"This requirement is boostable\" style=\"cursor:help; text-decoration: underline dotted;\">boostable</span>)</sup>\n** <span class=\"scp\" data-skill=\"Cooking\" data-level=\"43\">[[File:Cooking icon.png|21x21px|link=Cooking|alt=Cooking]] 43 [[Cooking]]</span> <sup>(<span title=\"This requirement is boostable\" style=\"cursor:help; text-decoration: underline dotted;\">boostable</span>)</sup>","items":"* [[Shrimps]]\n* [[Salmon]]\n* [[Tuna]]\n* [[Bass]]\n* [[Swordfish]]\n* [[Pickaxe]] - rune highly recommended\n* 2 [[Ruby|cut rubies]]\n* [[Ring Mould]]\n* [[Necklace Mould]]\n* Any [[poison cure]] like [[Antipoison]] (you will lose this item)\n* Means to cast all 4 [[Blast spells]]"}

Walkthrough[edit | edit source]

It is recommended to bring all the required quest items with you from the start of the quest along with some food and the following teleports if possible: Varrock, Camelot, Ardougne, Falador, Edgeville (Amulet of glory), Al Kharid (Ring of dueling).

Starting out[edit | edit source]

  • Talk to Dimintheis in a house southeast of the east bank in Varrock and north of the fancy dress shop. ( 3•2•1)…
    3Hi, I am a bold adventurer.
    2So where is this crest?
    1Ok, I will help you.
  • Head to Catherby and talk to Caleb in the building north-east of the bank. ( 1•2•1)…
    1Are you Caleb Fitzharmon?
    2So can I have your bit?
    1Ok, I will get those.
  • Speak to him again and give him all the fish. Note: Ask of the whereabouts of the other crest parts, or you will not be able to progress!( 1)…
    1Uh... what happened to the rest of it?
  • Speak to the Gem Trader in Al Kharid. ( 3)…
    3I'm in search of a man named Avan Fitzharmon.
  • Go north of the Gem Trader to the scorpion mining pit, and speak to the 'Man' with the yellow cape there (Avan). ( 2)…
    2I'm looking for a man named Avan Fitzharmon.

The 'perfect' necklace and ring[edit | edit source]

  • Head into the Dwarven Mine underneath Ice Mountain and run to the far most western end and speak to Boot. ( 1)…
    1Hello. I'm in search of very high quality gold.
  • Teleport to Ardougne, head east and climb down the old ruin entrance to the Witchaven Dungeon near Witchaven and Ardougne ship port. (Labelled on the world map by the icon. You may need to defend yourself against some hellhounds, so come prepared).
  • Enter the dungeon. Do not enter the wall to the east. There is a north room, a south room, and a locked eastern room that contains hellhounds and the perfect gold ore.
  • To unlock the east gate:
    • Go to the north and lift the lever outside (up)
    • Then to the south room through the eastern door and lift that lever (up)
    • Back north and pull the outer lever (down), enter and lift the inner lever (up)
    • Exit the room and lift the lever (up)
    • Enter the south room by the western door and lower the lever (down). Exit through the eastern door.
  • Go into the hellhound room and mine 2 'perfect' gold ores. Their aggro range is short so try to zigzag through them. Anticipating hits will manageably yield the ores with a rune pickaxe. Alternatively, low level players can stand in a safespot for 10 minutes so the hellhounds stop being aggressive.
  • Go to a furnace (northern Lumbridge - use the home teleport) and smelt the ores into bars, then use the bars on the furnace again and make one 'perfect' ruby necklace and 'perfect' ruby ring. Be careful not to use make-all as it will make two rings or necklaces
  • Go back to the 'Man' (Avan) and give him the jewelry to receive the second crest piece.

Fighting Chronozon[edit | edit source]

Chronozon is located next to the Earth Obelisk marked on the map.
  • Teleport to Varrock (lumberyard teleport), and head north-east to the Jolly Boar Inn near the lumberyard. Go upstairs and speak to Johnathon. Speak to him, and use your anti-poison on him to learn the location of the final crest piece.
  • Prepare for the fight:
    • Bring runes for each of the four blast spells: Wind Blast, Water Blast, Earth Blast, and Fire Blast as you need to deal damage with each spell.
    • Be aware that Chronozon's fight takes place in part of the Wilderness and other players may attack you there.
    • Maging is recommended. You will have to kill a poison spider to use the safespots, so anti-poison is recommended.
    • Diary tasks: Since Chronozon is at the Earth Obelisk and the Air Obelisk is to the north, you can bring two Unpowered orbs, 6 Cosmic runes, 60 Earth runes, 60 air runes to respectively complete a medium and hard Wilderness task (with 60/66 Magic).
  • Go to Edgeville or the small hut west of Varrock if you have a brass key to enter the Edgeville Dungeon.
  • Head to the gate dividing the Wilderness from the rest of the dungeon.
  • Travel slightly north, then make a left past the thugs and Chaos druids, through a second gate.
  • Travel west, then south past the poison spiders and Black demons, where you will find Chronozon.
  • Safespot him between the southern rocks. You may have to kill a poison spider first.
    • You must successfully cast each blast spell on Chronozon (no splashes or zeroes).
    • Once he has been weakened by each blast spell, kill him with any spell, melee, or ranged.
  • Pick up the last crest piece and teleport out.
  • Assemble the Family crest and head back to Dimintheis in Varrock to conclude.

Quest complete!

Rewards[edit | edit source]

  • 1 Quest point
  • Steel gauntlets
    • The steel gauntlets confer useful perks. Each brother will imbue them with a special ability. They will initially do this for free. Be careful choosing, though, since you can only have one effect, and it will cost you 25,000 coins to change them. Dimintheis will provide you with a "magically" found pair should you lose them.
v • d • e

{{external|rs}}
{{Quick Guide}}

==Details==
{{Quest details page|Family Crest}}

==Walkthrough==
'''It is recommended to bring all the required quest items with you from the start of the quest along with some food and the following teleports if possible: [[Varrock]], [[Camelot]], [[Ardougne]], [[Falador]], [[Edgeville]] ([[Amulet of glory]]), [[Al Kharid]] ([[Ring of dueling]]).'''

=== Starting out ===
{{Checklist|*Talk to [[Dimintheis]] in a house southeast of the east bank in [[Varrock]] and north of the fancy dress shop. {{Chat option|3Hi, I am a bold adventurer.|2So where is this crest?|1Ok, I will help you.}}
*Head to [[Catherby]] and talk to [[Caleb]] in the building north-east of the bank. {{Chat option|1Are you Caleb Fitzharmon?|2So can I have your bit?|1Ok, I will get those.}}
*Speak to him again and give him all the fish. '''Note: Ask of the whereabouts of the other crest parts, or you will not be able to progress!'''{{Chat option|1Uh... what happened to the rest of it?}}
*Speak to the [[Gem Trader]] in [[Al Kharid]]. {{Chat option|3I'm in search of a man named Avan Fitzharmon.}}
*Go north of the Gem Trader to the [[scorpion]] mining pit, and speak to the 'Man' with the yellow cape there ([[Avan]]). {{Chat option|2I'm looking for a man named Avan Fitzharmon.}}}}

=== The 'perfect' necklace and ring ===
{{Checklist|*Head into the [[Dwarven Mine]] underneath [[Ice Mountain]] and run to the far most western end and speak to [[Boot]]. {{Chat option|1Hello. I'm in search of very high quality gold.}}
*Teleport to [[Ardougne]], head east and climb down the old ruin entrance to the [[Witchaven Dungeon]] near [[Witchaven]] and Ardougne ship port. (Labelled on the world map by the [[File:Dungeon map link icon.png]] icon. You may need to defend yourself against some hellhounds, so come prepared).
*Enter the dungeon. Do '''not''' enter the wall to the east. There is a north room, a south room, and a locked eastern room that contains [[hellhound]]s and the perfect gold ore.
*To unlock the east gate:
**Go to the north and lift the lever outside (up)
**Then to the south room through the eastern door and lift that lever (up)
**Back north and pull the outer lever (down), enter and lift the inner lever (up)
**Exit the room and lift the lever (up)
**Enter the south room by the western door and lower the lever (down). Exit through the eastern door.
*Go into the [[hellhound]] room and mine 2 [['perfect' gold ore]]s. Their aggro range is short so try to zigzag through them. Anticipating hits will manageably yield the ores with a rune pickaxe. Alternatively, low level players can stand in a safespot for 10 minutes so the hellhounds stop being aggressive.
*Go to a [[furnace]] (northern [[Lumbridge]] - use the [[home teleport]]) and smelt the ores into bars, then use the bars on the furnace again and make one [['perfect' necklace|'perfect' ruby necklace]] and [['perfect' ring|'perfect' ruby ring]]. '''Be careful not to use make-all as it will make two rings or necklaces'''
*Go back to the 'Man' ([[Avan]]) and give him the jewelry to receive the second crest piece.}}

=== Fighting Chronozon ===
[[File:Edgeville Dungeon map.png|thumb|573x573px|Chronozon is located next to the Earth Obelisk marked on the map.]]
{{Checklist|*Teleport to Varrock ([[lumberyard teleport]]), and head north-east to the [[Jolly Boar Inn]] near the lumberyard. Go upstairs and speak to [[Johnathon]]. Speak to him, and use your [[anti-poison]] on him to learn the location of the final crest piece.
*Prepare for the fight:
**Bring runes for each of the four [[blast spells]]: [[Wind Blast]], [[Water Blast]], [[Earth Blast]], and [[Fire Blast]] as you need to deal damage with each spell.
**'''Be aware that [[Chronozon]]'s fight takes place in part of the [[Wilderness]] and other players may attack you there.'''
**Maging is recommended. You will have to kill a [[poison spider]] to use the safespots, so [[anti-poison]] is recommended. 
**Diary tasks: Since Chronozon is at the [[Obelisk of Earth|Earth Obelisk]] and the [[Obelisk of Air|Air Obelisk]] is to the north, you can bring two [[Unpowered orb]]s, 6 [[Cosmic rune]]s, 60 [[Earth rune]]s,  60 [[air rune]]s to respectively complete a medium and hard Wilderness task (with 60/66 [[Magic]]).
*Go to [[Edgeville]] or the small hut west of [[Varrock]] if you have a [[brass key]] to enter the [[Edgeville Dungeon]].
*Head to the gate dividing the [[Wilderness]] from the rest of the dungeon.
*Travel slightly north, then make a left past the [[thug]]s and [[Chaos druid]]s, through a second gate.
*Travel west, then south past the [[poison spider]]s and [[Black demons]], where you will find Chronozon.
*Safespot him between the southern rocks. You may have to kill a [[poison spider]] first.
**You must ''successfully'' cast each blast spell on Chronozon (no splashes or zeroes).
**Once he has been weakened by each blast spell, kill him with any spell, melee, or ranged.
*Pick up the last crest piece and teleport out.
*Assemble the Family crest and head back to [[Dimintheis]] in Varrock to conclude.
}}

'''Quest complete!'''
